name: DevPod DevOps (Neovim btw)
postCreateCommand: echo 'Setting up DevOps container with dotfiles...' && echo 'Cloning dotfiles repository...' && git clone https://github.com/ReCoL1337/.dotfiles.git ~/.dotfiles && cd ~/.dotfiles && echo 'Setting up dotfiles...' && stow --adopt -v . && echo 'Dotfiles setup complete!' && echo 'Verifying tools...' && go version && cargo --version && terraform --version && helm version --client && nvim --version
